_sText:
I have recently fixed this awesome map because original version doesn't work on newer source engines anymore.

**Fixes/Tweaks**

- Added HDR
- Now 64 Spawn points instead of 24!
- Replaced missing textures and overlays with new ones
- Fixed foliage and vine lighting
- Removed fog which was causing weird lighting effects
- Removed unnecessary foliage fading
- Added entry to the balcony on 2nd floor
- Removed some unnecessary nodraw textures which were causing strange house transparency
- Fixed darkness in main hall caused by usage of hdr
- Added ladder from outside to "B" bombsite to improve gameplay/tactics
- Fixed trees' and 3DSkybox trees' gray textures. Now environment looks much more realistic

**Changes in 1.1**

- Restored some original textures
- Restored two ladders on the facade
- Added old, custom "nav" file for bots.
- Changed sprite textures. Now they look smoother.
- Generated cubemaps textures for shiny effect.
- Restored radar overview and txt file

Original map:
de villa cocaina
